1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural entrepreneurs, Aries are often good at making money due to their impulsive nature and willingness to take risks.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Known for their practicality and love of stability, Tauruses tend to be excellent at managing finances and building long-term wealth.
3. Gemini - 5/10 - Geminis are often scattered and unpredictable, making it difficult for them to stay focused on financial goals.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Cancers can be great at nurturing their personal finances by being frugal and responsible, but may struggle with making bold investments.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Leos are natural-born leaders who often excel at building wealth through entrepreneurial endeavors or high-risk investments.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - With their attention to detail and analytical nature, Virgos tend to be excellent at managing personal finances and cutting costs.
7. Libra - 6/10 - Librans are often drawn to aesthetics and luxury, which can lead them to overspend on unnecessary luxuries.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Scorpios are naturally resourceful and perceptive, making it easy for them to detect financial scams or make smart investments.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Sagittarians tend to be optimistic and spontaneous, which can sometimes lead them to take unnecessary risks with their finances.
10. Capricorn - 8/10 - Capricorns are known for their discipline and ambition, making it easy for them to build wealth through hard work and smart financial planning.
11. Aquarius - 5/10 - Aquarians tend to be unpredictable and unconventional, which can make it difficult for them to stay focused on long-term financial goals.
12. Pisces - 4/10 - Pisces often struggle with materialism and impulsiveness, making it challenging for them to manage their finances effectively.
